Uses of Shard in org.hibernate.shards.strategy.access
 

Methods in org.hibernate.shards.strategy.access that return types with arguments of type Shard
protected  Iterable<Shard> SequentialShardAccessStrategy.getNextOrderingOfShards(List<Shard> shards)
          Override this method if you want to control the order in which the shards are operated on (this comes in handy when paired with exit strategies that allow early exit because it allows you to evenly distribute load).
protected  Iterable<Shard> LoadBalancedSequentialShardAccessStrategy.getNextOrderingOfShards(List<Shard> shards)
